Room.Name: Distillery Office
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the foreman's office for the distillery.
Room.LongDescription: The smell of rum is almost strong enough to give you a buzz by itself. The office is small, with a great oaken desk and a broken down couch. A glass window looks out onto the floor of the distillery, where you see great vats and a number of workers going about the business of making rum. A sign on the door says, "If you're not dwarven, don't bother to apply for work."
